top_stories.title: Nothing’s retro-looking Headphone 1 are already $30 off
top_stories.description: Nothing’s Headphone 1 hit the scene back in July, and they’re already being discounted. Right now, you can pick up the brand’s first pair of over-the-ear headphones for an all-time low price of $269 ($30 off) at Amazon and Nothing’s online storefront. What makes the Headphone 1 unique is their retro-transparent design that Nothing introduced […]
top_stories.author: Brandon Russell

top_stories.title: Off to the races: DRBE develops world’s largest real-time EW test range
top_stories.description: The system allows for the interaction of synthetic RF entities simultaneously, all within a fully software-defined environment.
top_stories.author: outreach@darpa.mil
top_stories.content: The system allows for the interaction of synthetic RF entities simultaneously, all within a fully software-defined environment.

top_stories.title: Build a scalable containerized web application on AWS using the MERN stack with Amazon Q Developer – Part 1
top_stories.description: In a traditional SDLC, a lot of time is spent in the different phases researching approaches that can deliver on requirements: iterating over design changes, writing, testing and reviewing code, and configuring infrastructure. In this post, you learned about the experience and saw productivity gains you can realize by using Amazon Q Developer as a coding assistant to build a scalable MERN stack web application on AWS.
top_stories.author: Bill Chan
top_stories.content: In a traditional SDLC, a lot of time is spent in the different phases researching approaches that can deliver on requirements: iterating over design changes, writing, testing and reviewing code, and configuring infrastructure. In this post, you learned about the experience and saw productivity gains you can realize by using Amazon Q Developer as a coding assistant to build a scalable MERN stack web application on AWS.

top_stories.title: GitHub’s New Agents Panel to Serve as a ‘Mission Control Centre’ for Developers
top_stories.description: Developers can assign background tasks without switching pages, monitor running tasks with real-time status, jump into pull requests when they are ready to view and more. The post GitHub’s New Agents Panel to Serve as a ‘Mission Control Centre’ for Developers appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Supreeth Koundinya
top_stories.content: Developers can assign background tasks without switching pages, monitor running tasks with real-time status, jump into pull requests when they are ready to view and more. top_stories.title: OpenAI's GPT-5 Now Generally Available on Microsoft Azure AI Foundry
top_stories.description: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration. This suite enhances applications like Microsoft 365 Copilot and GitHub Copilot, enabling seamless interactions and high-quality outputs tailored for real-world scenarios. GPT-5 empowers organizations to drive AI transformation efficiently. By Steef-Jan Wiggers
top_stories.author: Steef-Jan Wiggers
top_stories.content: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration.
